ygData.messageBody:
This guy's obviously just trying to start a flame war.... let him rant.

-----Original Message-----
From: yur@... [mailto:yur@...]
Sent: Thursday, June 17, 1999 11:35 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] KS tricks + Grouping for XP


From: yur@...



Why does everyone keep telling me "come to server blah blah and see how
your tricks works" . I am on Tunare server and i'm gona stay here and KS as
long as i think its giving me more XP than doing something else. Anyways,
ppl
on every server are just humans, some are stupid, some are smart. Some ppl
can't do dick all about me KS their kills and some will take action. So it
doesn't depend on which server you play on, you can always KS. On Tunare,
not a
lot of KSer out there, i've only met 2 others who also KS on a regular
basis, so
its pretty rare too. The more rare it is, the better actually, cuz most ppl
don't know how to deal with it instead of just crying how i'm taking all the
xp
and challenge me to duals hahaha.

[snip!]
(trash deleted)
